name: Sentient Missiles
description:
Version 0.94A released! More details later

-----

Controls

Default controls are as follows:

  • Movement keys: W A S D
  • Camera zoom: Mouse wheel up / down
  • Reset camera: Q
  • Launch MiniMissile (Arcade Mode): E
  • Afterburner: Space bar
  • Self destruct: Backspace
  • Pause game: Escape

-----

System specs

Lowest tested system: Core i5 processor with GeForce GTX 1660 could run it with full gfx settings. Please refer to graphics settings in game to configure.

-----

Credits

Game created by Mikko Moilanen
Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
Fonts:

  • Main font: Aero Matics by Jayvee Enaguas (https://www.dafont.com/aero-matics.font)
  • Logo font: Bangers by Vernon Adams (https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bangers)

Sounds:

  • UI sounds from Gamedev Market
  • Explosion sounds from Explosion sound pack
  • Jet engine sounds from Aircraft engines sound pack
  • Air raid siren sound effect by Sound Effects Factory
  • Most of the other sounds from Free Sounds Library
-----
